rows.label: qst701305_msg0001
rows.name: This flower is...!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0002
rows.name: It's what Leon found, risking his life.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0003
rows.name:
...I'm sorry. We couldn't
bring him back.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0004
rows.name: No...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't say it well, but... he
had a peaceful look on his face.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0006
rows.name:
From his appearance, I
don't think he suffered.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0007
rows.name:
I thought he was a hopeless
case, but I never thought
it would come to this.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0008
rows.name: Leon... you damn fool.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0009
rows.name: Did you call!? My dear friend!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0010
rows.name:
Just in time. I found something,
and it's quite the talker.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0011
rows.name:
Sorry, but could you
take it off my hands?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0012
rows.name:
Ah, that was a truly stimulating
experience! I thought I was
dead for sure this time!!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0013
rows.name: Uh, I think you actually were dead!?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0014
rows.name: Maybe he was just playing dead.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0015
rows.name:
If you're serious, I'm
going to punch you.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0016
rows.name: Unbelievable. Is this even possible...?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0017
rows.name: That's what I was going to say.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0018
rows.name:
I've lived a long time, but this is
the first time I've seen a living
person crawl out of the ground.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0019
rows.name:
Thank you, kind old man!
I'm glad you came by!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0020
rows.name:
I don't really get it, but
we're in your debt, gramps.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0021
rows.name:
Not at all, no need for thanks.
Well, I've delivered him safely.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0022
rows.name:
I thought it was chaotic, but
this is just refreshing.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0023
rows.name:
I don't understand what's
going on. A dead person
coming back to life...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0024
rows.name:
That's because I heard your voice
calling me sadly from afar.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0025
rows.name:
Hey Sarah, don't you want to smile
from the bottom of your heart?
Don't you want to be happy?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0026
rows.name:
While desperately searching for the flower,
I realized that the reason I'm so drawn to
you is because I want to know the real you.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0028
rows.name:
...I guess I have no choice.
Just as you showed courage,
I'll take a step forward too.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0029
rows.name: Hah, does that mean!?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0030
rows.name:
If it's just for tea,
I'll join you sometimes.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0031
rows.name:
I'm sorry for being unreasonable
this time. Thank you for the
wonderful flower. And also...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0032
rows.name: "Will you go out with me"!?"

rows.label: qst701305_msg0033
rows.name: Are you really that stupid!?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0034
rows.name: ...No! I wanted to say welcome back!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0035
rows.name: Oh, Sarah!! My angel!!

rows.label: qst701305_msg0036
rows.name: You were able to say it, your feelings.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0037
rows.name: You've decided to trust him?

rows.label: qst701305_msg0038
rows.name:
The fear hasn't completely
gone away, but being
pessimistic all the time...

rows.label: qst701305_msg0039
rows.name: Thank you, for making me realize.

rows.label: qst701305_msg0040
rows.name: No, thank you.
